links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..164 [The full sequence]
B. Balamohan, A. Kuznetsov and S. Tanny, On the behavior of a variant of Hofstadter's Q-sequence, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 10 (2007), #07.7.1.
maple: V := proc(n) option remember; if n<=3 then 1 else if n > V(n-1) and n > V(n-3) then RETURN(V(n-V(n-1))+V(n-V(n-3))); else ERROR(" died at n= ", n); fi; fi; end;
author: _R. K. Guy_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 06 2007
